metadata.value: 自動車運転手たちよ、ひと肌脱いでくれ！

metadata.label: 内容記述
metadata.value: Automobile drivers do your bit!Drive a motor truck for Uncle Sam.Hundreds of men required between the ages of 18 and 45 who can handle and care for motor trucks.Here is a chance for you to serve your country in a most practical way - by doing that which you can do best.Military training as a soldier is not required, and this branch of the service - Quartermaster Section Enlisted Reserve Corps - you do not have to drill with rifles, perform guard duty or other purely military duties which fall to the lot of soldiers of the Infantry, Cavalry and other branches of the Army, except in an emergency.You do have the rank of Sergeant, draw $36 a month pay, receiving - in addition - rations, quarters, clothing, fuel, bedding, medicine and medical attendance when required.There is a chance for rapid promotion in the case of men of high character who show most proficiency in their chosen line.You surely want to play a man’s part in the struggle for justice and freedom in which America has entered.Recruiting Station1790 Broadway, cor. 58th StreetNew York City（自動車運転手たちよ、ひと肌脱いでくれ！アメリカのためにトラックを運転してほしいのだトラックを操作・管理可能な18から45歳の男性多数募集ここに最も実用的に君たちの国に貢献する機会がある君が最善を尽くせる方法で）
